pageContext.claim: “For years, these sadistic mass murderer, Qasem Soleimani, planned and executed attacks against American targets, killing and wounding thousands of U.S. service members, and many, many thousands and even hundreds of thousands of other people.”
pageContext.analysis: The official Pentagon estimate for the number of American soldiers killed in Iraq because of Iran -- which perhaps one could attribute all to Gen. Qasem Soleimani -- is 608.
